game.name: DC Universe™ Online
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: DC Universe Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Universe. Become one of a new breed of Heroes or Villains and wield incredible powers as you go to war with legendary characters such as Batman, Superman, Lex Luthor and The Joker.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DC Universe Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Universe. Become one of a new breed of Heroes or Villains and wield incredible powers as you go to war with legendary characters such as Batman, Superman, Lex Luthor and The Joker.

reviewHighlights.text: 게임을 하고싶어 한국어 지원이 필요해 이게임에 나는 이미 많은 돈을 썼어 하지만 한글이 없어서 많이 불편해 한글패치가 필요해
